channel.title: [PI] Auto saving problems :S
channel.description: I am having some problems with the auto saving it doesn't auto save at all. I have tried changing the config folder but this doesn't change anything. If the server crashes this will cause a very big roll back and that would be extremely irritating. Please can anyone help me? :) It would be much appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Auto saving problems :S
item.dc:creator: @bobmich bobmich
item.description:
@bobmich wrote:

I am having some problems with the auto saving it doesn’t auto save at all.
I have tried changing the config folder but this doesn’t change anything.
If the server crashes this will cause a very big roll back and that would be extremely irritating.
Please can anyone help me?
It would be much appreciated.
Thanks.
